gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Db

Class DbBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Db.DbBase

  • public class DbBase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides base interfaces to LVG database. This class utilize Java DataBase Connectivity (JDBC) to connection to LVG database (Instant DB).

    History:

    Version:
    V-2013
    Author:
    NLM NLS Development Team
